data.eml:eml: Albistyla, a new genus of Neotropical Limosininae (Diptera: Sphaeroceridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marshall, Stephen A. (2014): Albistyla, a new genus of Neotropical Limosininae (Diptera: Sphaeroceridae). Zootaxa 3793 (2): 257-264, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3793.2.5
